title: Marine Auxiliary Boilerâ€™s Fuel Pump Tripping.
description: Marine auxiliary boiler (AB) is only used in port and the exhaust boiler caters for all heating and steam needs while at sea.(fig 6-blue arrow). These boilers have boiler burners (BB) (fig 6-purple arrow)   to supply the required heat when the supply of heat from the ME exhausts gases is not sufficient.
